About Me

Let me tell you a little bit about myself and what I do

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

My name is Nicholas Suraci and I am a front end developer. I started out on codecademy and when I first saw Hello World print out onto the screen I was hooked. After spending hours on that website, I decided to get into a more advanced learning environment. I switched to Udemy where I have completed a few courses about front end web development. After my Udemy courses I started doing my own projects either using front end mentors mockups or building a webpage with my own wireframes and images from pexels.
